review: I had originally praised this product, but after only four months it doesn't work right at all.  It constantly bumps me out of apps and tells me I have no internet, but when I go into network settings it says I'm connected to my wifi and I have very good signal strength.  I called Amazon about this and they had me unplug my router and Amazon fire stick and then plug them back in.  I told them that I know the stick is faulty because the internet on all my other devices works just fine and I can even run programs on my computer through an HDMI cord into the same TV without any problems whatsoever at all... Yet still they act like it's anything else that's causing the problem but the stick.  Don't waste $40 on this garbage!! Your better off getting Apple TV.  That's definitely where I'm headed after this experience...
author: The "Liz"ard
